application.model

Class WordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.WordReader

  • public class WordReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Team Garbage WordReader reads a line from either the easy, medium, or hard word banks. It adds the read word to an array list (words) and then returns a random word from the file through the getRandomWord method. Other random methods are also located in this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double getRandomAlienSpawn()
      returns an alien spawn from the top instead of the right side of the scene, makes sure it isn't out of bounds or clipping as well.
      static double getRandomSpawn()
      returns a spawn randomly located within the scene size It also makes sure it isn't spawned out of bounds or clipping the scene
      static void getRandomTimer()
      selects a random enemy spawn rate for either of the difficulties
      static java.lang.String getRandomWord()
      returns a random word from the words ArrayList
